name: Arbo Technologies
description: Arbo is an all-in-one accounting, tax, and FP&A SaaS platform for tech companies providing real-time access to financial insights such as cash flow, burn rate, profitability, yearly taxes, and financial projections.
one_liner: Arbo is an all-in-one accounting, tax, and FP&A SaaS platform for tech companies providing real-time access to financial insights such as cash flow, burn rate, profitability, yearly taxes, and financial projections.
